name: Lantern (itch) (TeamLantern)
description:
Lost in a mine shaft, you must climb your way out of the darkness. Your only savior, a hand lantern that will light your way. But be quick, or you could be lost in the mines forever...

How to play:

Use WSAD to move

Jump or Double Jump with W

Hit Spacebar to launch or release grappling rope

Aim grappling rope with mouse cursor
